arts.sum: Barcelona made it seven wins from wins when they narrowly defeated Getafe at the Estadi Olimpic on Wednesday, and now the intention is to go for eight from eight when they make the trip to El Sadar on Saturday evening. Osasuna will be the opponents for Hansi Flick’s all-conquering side.
